name: Dispersal Vectors
description:
Dispersal Vectors is a game that simplifies systems found in nature into playable diagrams. 

  • Use mouse to click
  • Adjust sliders and press buttons
  • Figure out advantageous plant traits in each level

_________________________________________________

Like games like this? Check out our Patreon for monthly content!

The original prototype was made during Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme ROOTS. Thanks to the support of our patrons, we were able to develop the prototype further into this game.
